description: Amount of solar radiation (also known as shortwave radiation) reaching the surface of the Earth (both direct and diffuse) minus the amount reflected by the Earth's surface (which is governed by the albedo)
data_packaging: Single NetCDF for the whole period
content_description: The NetCDF file contains monthly solar radiation data spanning from 1950 to 2022
notes: This dataset was downloaded from Copernicus CDS website
